alert.note: Alert for Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 09 at 4:09PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hudspeth County through 400 PM MDT... At 309 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Cornudas, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cornudas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin
